data.oai_dc:dc: This package "MAPbox.rar" contains all raw data and reconstruction code (in MATLAB) that is needed to reconstruct the T1 maps of the phantom & volunteer study of the Manuscript "Model-Based Acceleration of Look-Locker T1 Mapping" which is to be published in PLOS ONE in 2015.If you only need the reconstructed data, please additionally download "MAPrecon.rar".

T1 mapping|T1 relaxometry|model-based reconstruction|magnetic resonance imaging|MRI|inversion recovery Look-Locker|inversion recovery snapshot FLASH|Look-Locker|inversion recovery magnetization preparation|single-shot|parameter mapping|k-space weighted image contrast|radial acquisition
